subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Conference USA has signed an agreement to send one of its teams to this year’s Hawaii Bowl. The runner-up in the Conference USA championship game or another selection will be invited to take on a Western Athletic Conference team — Hawaii if it is bowl eligible — in the bowl on Dec. 24.
